dict.acceptation: 咽喉；颈前部；[植物学]管颈；
用沙哑的声音或嗓音发音；

sent.orig: Micro fine throat and ultra-mini throat are major pore throats with little connectivity.
sent.trans: 孔喉以微细喉和特细喉为主，孔隙的连通性较差。

sent.orig: His throat easily gets sore, so he takes throat tablets with him all the time.
sent.trans: 他嗓子容易发炎，所以随身带着润喉的含片。

sent.orig: Nancy:My throat is sore, I should get a throat culture.
sent.trans: 我喉咙痛，得去做一次咽喉细菌检查。

sent.orig: Fine throat-small pore and micro-fine throat-small pore are the main pore structure type.
sent.trans: 孔隙主要类型为粒间孔隙、粒内溶孔，孔隙结构类型以细喉小孔和微细喉小孔为主。

sent.orig: Wait a throat, wait a throat.
